alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cache and northeastern Box Elder Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 442 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Corinne, or near Brigham City, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Logan, Brigham City, Tremonton, Cache, Smithfield, Hyrum, Perry, Wellsville, Willard, Lewiston, Bear River City, Mantua, Corinne, Clarkston, Trenton, Plymouth, Utah State University, Benson, Peter and Riverside. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 355 and 388. Interstate 84 between mile markers 40 and 42. US Route 89 between mile markers 459 and 463. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A severe thunderstorm watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northern Utah.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
